@graph.name: Easy Dinner Rolls No Yeast - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Easy Dinner Rolls No Yeast. These soft herbed Dinner Rolls are ready in 25 minutes! Add herbs of choice, or garlic. Vegan Yeast-free Soy-free Nut-free Recipe

@graph.name: Easy Dinner Rolls No Yeast
@graph.description: Easy Dinner Rolls No Yeast. These soft herbed Dinner Rolls are ready in 25 minutes! Add herbs of choice, or garlic. Vegan Yeast-free Soy-free Nut-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups unbleached white flour  (or ap flour)
1/3 tsp salt (use less if the aquafaba is very salted)
dried or fresh herbs of choice (optional. I added some rosemary and thyme)
1/3 cup aquafaba (chickpea water, water from a can of chickpeas or use 1/3 cup non dairy milk + 1 Tbsp flax/chia seed meal)
2 Tbsp non dairy yogurt  (or cashew or melted vegan butter)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl whisk all the dry ingredients really well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl whisk all the dry ingredients really well.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl mix the aquafaba, yogurt, oil, vinegar and 2 tbsp water.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl mix the aquafaba, yogurt, oil, vinegar and 2 tbsp water.

recipeInstructions.text: Add half the flour into the wet and mix in until well combined. Add the rest of the flour and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add half the flour into the wet and mix in until well combined. Add the rest of the flour and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Get your hands in to knead the mixture. Add water 1 tbsp at a time to knead into a soft dough. The dough will get stickier as you knead, which is ok. Stop when the dough is soft and starting to get quite sticky. Let the dough sit for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Get your hands in to knead the mixture. Add water 1 tbsp at a time to knead into a soft dough. The dough will get stickier as you knead, which is ok. Stop when the dough is soft and starting to get quite sticky. Let the dough sit for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a tsp of oil on the dough and spread all over. Divide the dough into 7 to 9 pieces. Roll into as smooth as possible balls and place in parchment lined cake pan, close to each other but not touching.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a tsp of oil on the dough and spread all over. Divide the dough into 7 to 9 pieces. Roll into as smooth as possible balls and place in parchment lined cake pan, close to each other but not touching.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F / 200ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F / 200ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: Spray water on the shaped dinner rolls. Cover with another parchment to seal the top as much as possible. Let it sit for 4 to 5 minutes while the oven heats up.
recipeInstructions.name: Spray water on the shaped dinner rolls. Cover with another parchment to seal the top as much as possible. Let it sit for 4 to 5 minutes while the oven heats up.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 13 minutes. Remove the top parchment. Brush with vegan butter or maple syrup, and bake for another 2 minutes. Broil for 1/2 to 1 minute to brown if needed. Do not over brown else the rolls will become too biscuit like.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 13 minutes. Remove the top parchment. Brush with vegan butter or maple syrup, and bake for another 2 minutes. Broil for 1/2 to 1 minute to brown if needed. Do not over brown else the rolls will become too biscuit like.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the pan from the oven. Brush vegan butter on the rolls. Let them rest for a minute before serving. The the top will feel crusty but will soften a bit as it sits.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the pan from the oven. Brush vegan butter on the rolls. Let them rest for a minute before serving. The the top will feel crusty but will soften a bit as it sits.

recipeInstructions.text: Store over the counter covered for the day. These are best served warm out of the oven. Open them up and serve with vegan butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Store over the counter covered for the day. These are best served warm out of the oven. Open them up and serve with vegan butter.
